item.title: iOS
item.description: The Edge library is offered as a dynamic framework. The easiest way to install it is through Cocoapods. Installation Cocoapods The EdgeSDK has two dependencies to other private frameworks (Innolib and SignifyIndoorPositioning). To get access to the EdgeSDK and its dependencies, you need to have access to the Github organization ‘Edge-Connect-SDK’, and more specifically to the iOS repository in there: https://github.com/Edge-Connect-SDK/edge-sdk-ios . To install the EdgeSDK, first add this repository as a source to your Podfile.
